item_category: Live every moment with the ultra-handy 10.1 inch Alba tablet in black. Designed with a bright IPS screen and easy to navigate display, this palm-sized device is perfect for keeping the little ones entertained. There's even a parental control app, so you can rest assured knowing they're safe from adult content. With front and rear cameras, take photos in an instant and enjoy 32GB of storage and up to 64GB with a micro SD card.
review_title: Easy to set up, great battery life and 2 covers
Not as advertised on the web site
Looks great battery doesn't last very well
Replacement for same unit just over 2 years old
My Alba tablets great for my online course!!
Itâ€™s brilliant quick and easy to use
The Alba tablet, easy to use,
Granddaughter was realy pleased with it,
Grate tablet, my daughter love it :)
very good and easy to use
Tablet freezes with the key pads
For the price I don't believe it can be beaten.
Is ok but is quite slow
Its affordable and does it work x fab
Easy to set up, great for catching up on Netflix
This helps my husband as he has dementia
Did everything I need it for
my boy loves his new pad.
Does everything it should do and at low cost .bril
Cheap but as good as ipad
Looks good. And everything functions as it should
Just bought 19thmarch only used once making a misf
The tablet is fantastic for the money
Better than I thought it would be.
Does a great job for online gaming!
The Alba is easy to use.
Great tablet and good value for money
Does what it is designed to do well.
Easy to use tablet for basic browsing
review_text: Am so happy I bought this item as I use it for work purposes.
Bought this last month my daughter loves it and says it better than other ones she has used
Grandson uses it every day
I bought this for my grandsons birthday so happy with it I have just purchased another one for another grandsons birthday
Iâ€™ve had it for 3 weeks now canâ€™t fault it. The charger dock is still solid, which Iâ€™ve found to be a problem with most tablets, especially when young children are involved!
Got as a replacement as my sons got smashed. Good for a 9yo for youtube and games. The charger stopped working after a week but they are cheap enough to replace
Good all round tablet, very good picture quality but let down by the speakers which are a little tinny
I bought this a few weeks ago and am very pleased with it.
Excellent tablet for the money.does everything I need.delivered next day aswell.
Very reliable and plenty of space to download the apps I need on it.
Great little 10"tab for my granddaughter's birthday....easy to use and good looking....she loves it.

The model sold is the 10Q which is not the same as the 10 advertised on the web site, There is no USB 2 socket as advertised. It is overpriced, I should have guessed as there are two flimsy plastic covers included in the package. The sound is tinny, my Kindle Fire 5 sounds better.
Well worth the price !

Good value tablet but the screen is fragile and has cracked after only 2 weeks from my child pressing too hard on the screen. 
Great, if handled with care.
Nice tablet good size and easy set up
Looks good and the picture quality good
I likes argos.Its quite handy for any household stuff. Iâ€™m very happy with Argos store.
Seems to not last long beyond warranty precisely 3 months after expiry battery fails to charge or keep much power so replaced Â£10 cheaper than last time. Hopefully will get decent life this time
Really easy to set up and use. A good sized tablet well worth the money.

Not long i bought 2 for my boys so far they are using watching youtube kids no problem at all. Hard for me to get kids casing and screen protector. I try bought sreen protector its say alba 10.1 screen protector but when arrive the screen protector too big to tablet. I bought also casing for kids 10.1 universal casing but too small for the AlBa tablet.
Very happy, perfect product, good price, would recommendcto others.
The alba tablet is perfect to sit my online course on zoom the screen gives quality to everything I use in app and for personal use.its great I'd reccomend to a friend
5 star rating really lovely tablet easy to use and lovely size screen just what I was looking for
Very happy with the tablet

Amazon price 
Really fast
This was the second one of these tablets that I'd had to return.
really nice this table
Good product for the price
Good screen size, easier to use than a laptop and bigger and clearer to see than a phone!! The best of both worlds!!

Practically everything was set up....
Took less than 15mins to start using. Husband is very happy with it
Great product fast and reliable,easy to download apps from play store,will recommend.
The item was easy to use, at a good affordable price, and exactly what I wanted,
Granddaughter loved it. Ideal size for small hands nice and colourful easy to use, would recommend
This is my second Alba tablets for my children. Good price, good stuff. My children loves it :)
Brilliant tablet and great value in price, set up was easy and comes with 2 cases would recommend
My daughter complains of it glitching  since we bought it. I am now thinking of returning it. Very disappointed.

I was a bit nervous because of the low price, however, my fears were unfounded, when it arrived it exceeded my expectations.
Excellent value for money! Good speed, easy to set up and memory easily expanded with a micro SD card.
Great screen resolution, decent battery life.
Highly recommended.

Brought this product for my daughter.   This Alba tablet is ok if you only want something basic. YouTube, games,apps etc
If you want good camera/video quality, & sound reproduction, get a better quality make
Bought for an elderly relative. Easy to set up and easy to use.
I brought this for my daughter, I set it up and once this was done it kept switching off. I plugged the charger in and was 95% charged.
This 10" tablet is a great improvement to my old 7". It works a lot faster and makes reading and typing  a lot better, als the battery life is very good. I would recommend this tablet.
good price easy to use and screen good size would recommend to buy
Bought for my 8years daughter, she tells me so frustrating, mummy can't do my Google class work.

Hello, 
Please do not buy this product, it is absolutely awful. When I bought it, worked perfect but then the next day the Alba logo came on but not further than that. It would not turn on. But I returned it and got my money back so that helped.
It's a great size, streaming is beautiful with no problems, the screen is a good resolution and colour is vibrant. I couldn't find one better for the price or even if I spent another Â£50+
I know it's cheap but I wouldn't buy one again.. captain cutting out.. I don't even know why Argos are putting this in their stockroom

Well, itâ€™s a good price for a such nice product. Then only reason I am not so happy is because, I have to return it back! After my kid being used it for twee weeks the table started making noises from inside. My kid is every sad that I have to return it back. I have decided now to paying a little bit more and getting other table instead...!
It's ok for a young child but not for a teen as not very fast or powerful.
The grandkids loves it

the tablet is fine for checking the internet whilst watching the many hours of TV I enjoy every night. its obviously quite large for a tablet and therefore quite heavy. it can be a bit slow but thats probably due to my wi fi being in a different room. great value.
Basically its affordable and served its purpose. :) i bought it as a gift for my son :)

Bought this tablet expecting to be able to use it for Netflix etc however within LESS THAN AN HOUR of use, I came to the conclusion that it was not fit for purpose so. I tried to get a refund however this was not possible as the screen was, and I quote "covered in scratches". Upon further inspection scratches of any description yet to be found. I will be attempting to return it again however if it is rejected again, I will be selling it on Ebay so potential buyers, keep your eyes open for that!!
tablet is all good; for the money i cant moan

My son picked it, good screensize and memory.

Came with 2 cases which was a bonus.

A really decent tablet for the price
Absolutely worth the money I paid, I've needed a new tablet for a long time but not been able to afford one that was good quality like a Alba tablet.
Good value for money
Easy to set up. Excellent service at Retford store. Very efficient and organised
Easy to set up and use at a good price.
is exelent for this money.

Personally I would say dont bother as I brought one set it all up and it just turned of and wouldnt turn back on I gave it a second chance and returned that one and got another and 4 hours into using it, it did the same dont waste your time

I purchased this alba tablet about 3 weeks ago, I had an email offering support due to a problem with it, which occurred after a week, absolutely NO response from Argos whatsoever
Very dissatisfied with them, the problem with the tablet is it keeps 'flickering' rapidly
Easy to order and arrived on time!
The perfect tablet for a regular user who just wants to be distracted from day to day life. Does everything that it's more expensive counterparts does and is  nice and easy to use
Good value for the amount I paid, itâ€™s easy to set up and use and the battery so far has lasted well. Good screen to watch programmes on and the sound is also good.

Good quality considering itâ€™s the Argos product

Works quite fast
Good value, easy to setup.

You can't expect a lot for this price. I mainly got it to do facetime calls etc, and the camera isn't really good enough for that. 

It's sort of alright if you need a spare or a backup for basic web browsing and some apps. But it's been sitting unused, as it's pretty slow, so not that much fun to use. Might be a good basic kids tablet, as it comes with bouncy tablet protectors.
With a little help from myself my husband enjoys using this item, he has dementia, we find brain training games to help him, i would definitely recommend this to someone, its brilliant
Was stylish gd picture an Great value
Excellent tablet works great, excellent value for money and does the job. Great protective covers that come with it and the fact you get 2 is fantastic. Love it

This is a great tablet and very cheap. 6was worried about buying a cheap tablet but read the reviews and decided to give it a go. Good quality screen and does everything that a more expensive brand would do. Highly recommend
Just had this over a week and am impressed with it and amazed I got two covers included in the price.
good tablet for the price, however only wanted it to browse the internet and not download.

This is a really good tablet. It has a pretty decent battery life and even if it runs out I can still watch YouTube videos while it's actually charging. The memory is double my last tablet and apps etc download very quickly. The only downside so far is the sound quality which is ok but not as good as my old tablet and the camera quality which is really poor.
it has a long battery life, easy to use and plenty of space for several games.
Brilliant tablet and for the price for what come with it 2 cases as well and screen protector so i think its a bargain
Easy to set up and use well worth it definitely would recommend.
Poor quality, nice tablet comes with 2 cases, just poor camera quality
Good product for the price does what it should an easy to use. Lots of apps installed keeps busy in lockdown
For the money this is quite impressive,  certainly would recommend
Value for money. Easy to set up and use.
Buy it it's a really good price for the quality

Got this too replace an old worn out 7inch tablet. Wow have things changed. Starts in seconds, easy to use and the screen quality is very impressive. Mostly used to watch YouTube and does that very well. So far I can't find anything bad to say about it.
Bought as present for 76th birthday.  Easy to set up and use.  Good price.

Really good product for the price. Lovely little touch with the 2 covers that come included. 

Slightly slower that bigger brands as expected but fantastic value for money.
Great tablet needed one with a big screen was perfect our 10yr old loved it!!
I bought this for mr 4 year old greatgrandaughter she loves that it's so big and the choice of covers
Easy point of collection.Works welland good value for the money paid

Unfortunately I found out the hard way that you get what you pay for. Maybe I was just unlucky but I only loaded up a game on the tablet and it wouldnâ€™t work, hardly ever loaded up to play. In my experience with it I wouldnâ€™t recommend. Itâ€™s being refunded thanks to Argos.

bought as wanted something to use while in hospital. found it too be a great wee tablet so far. not had any problems with it. its the first tablet ive owned, so obviously cant compare it to other makes, but im happy with it. only wee problem is cant find a screen protector for it.
Great tablet, brought for my 8 year old and he loves it. Enough space for his downloads and battery time is good too

I don't no what I would do without Argo first time I was very nervous system how-to Go in to store because of viruses I am looking forward to going again what a service plus avoid que click it and pick up amazing I didn't have to wait just show up with screen shot or attachments of confirm email or text message there your you go pick up and leave, love  shopping at Argo.

I bought this tablet for my sons 8th birthday, he had always used by samung tablet prior to this one. 
The battery barely lasts a day, compared to 2-3days for samsung. This tablet has to be charged everynight, which is very frustrating. Also it takes a long time for the battery to be 100%.

Too slow to charge for too little use. Charger lead connection poor and easily dislodged and also laggy connection 
Disappointed 9 year old Roblox fan asked to return in the day after purchase
Price is reasonable though
Hi got this last week. So happy with it. Good amount of storage, brilliant size, good clear screen
Great tablet for the price bought for my 7 year old she loves it can add storage and is quick.
Got this for my little boy for his birthday amazing quality love that it comes with 2 cases an large screen xxx

Bought this for my 5 year old, it's a good little tablet and does everything he needs it to do; so it's good for watching annoying videos and playing games with annoying music.

Coming with two protective cases is a nice touch, although if it was for someone any younger you might need something more robust.
Just bought  this tablet 19 March for my grandsons birthday only been used ones and making ward noise taking it back

I purchased this tablet for my 4 year old daughter. The screen is a good size and the battery lasts around 8 hrs of constant use. The fact that it comes with two rubber covers in case it gets dropped is a bonus although it seems quite sturdy without them on. I would highly recommend if your buying one for a child!!
easy to use light to transport on holidays

For the price this tablet is brilliant, it starts up quickly & apps load just as fast, picture quality is very good with good contrast. I don't play games online so I can't comment on that, though I do watch quite a lot of online video and these play perfectly.
For everyday use it is perfect. The battery lasts 6-7 hours of constant use,.
This is the 2nd Alba tablet I've had, the last one still works, but is five years old and is getting a bit slow, this one seems like a very good replacement.
As advertised.  Delivered quick.
My kids loved the laptops and the covers are their favourites. It was reasonable and I ordered the same day and collect the same day. Thank you.

This tablet is ok as a first tablet. Ideal for a child. But not if you don't like waiting for apps to load. 
But then it is one of the cheapest tablets around and you pay for what you get.
Not for me though. I took it back and exchanged it.
I think this an efficient tablet. I only use it for online shopping and gaming. It's easy set up.  Battery not to bad depending on what your using it for!  It take good quality photos!
Good quality, looks good and had no problems.
I have found this product good and reliable.
Only 4 Stars given as instructions on operating and using Android system are poor
This tablet is THE one to get.
Amazing tablet!! Bought for my disabled brother and he loves it. So easy to use and heâ€™s really enjoying it. Iâ€™ll be buying one for myself next
I was pleasently surprised at this tablet does everything I need at a sensible price even has 2 covers very good.
Would recommend this product to anyone
Very good and good for the money

Excellent value for price, great processing speed on 10.1 inch sceen good functionality. 
Liking the two rubber cover's provided.
Good looking, clear and easy to use.
Brilliant tablet have had any problems with it and it's good for gaming and internet use
Quick and easy to set up. Ideal for daily use. Good sound & picture quality. Would definitely recommend.
Great price for the product,As always,Argos is the best!

Purchased this tablet for and on behalf of one of my elderly neighbours, 85, she loves it. Very easy set up procedure, it has everything pre loaded that you would want, and can be expanded with micro memory card. For the price has to be one of the best budget tablets available.
Good price and quality

This tablet is meeting my needs. I brought it for my young son to watch video n video demand app. It is sufficient and speedy is ok. 2 tablet cases are included. So it is value for money. However it is quite heavy. But it is acceptable for the price.
Great tablet with all the things I need on it the camera is not the best but I don't need it for that anyway so it doesn't bother me well worth the money and would recommend to anyone.
The tablet works absolutely fantastic, just what I needed.
One word " Brilliant "

This tablet is fast and easy to use. Itâ€™s nice and light to carry about and the silicone case that it comes with makes it comfortable to use on your lap. Very impressed with this value for money tablet

Good bright screen, charge lasts several hours of constant use, good WiFi connectivity. Be aware that this is not the full version of the Android 10 software if that is important to you. Being used to monitor LiFePO batteries with a built in bluetooth battery monitor and to run basic electronic charts.
Very pleased with the tablet. Easy to set up and good value
Havenâ€™t used it for gaming but for surfing and streaming itâ€™s grand - well worth the price.

I got this simply for doing my electric certificates. Didn't need an all singing and dancing tablet, just a functional one. This is plenty quick for my needs, memory is more than enough, connectivity spot on. 
Basically it does what it says on the tin. Love the fact you get 2 yes 2 silicon type covers, perfect for me as I've dropped it once, protected it no problem. For the price you can't complain or go wrong. 
The camera is not the best in low light, but perfect for my needs
Very happy with my purchase, highly recommended.

Brought for my little one and what a great little tablet it is! Lovely big screen to watch & play games & great to do school work on. At such a good price too. Even better that you get 2 rubber skins for it. The battery last most of the day with home schooling, easy to set up & use. 
Great little buy
Comes with some funky coloured cases too!
i bought the tablets for my nieces to do online school! It works great

Soo far soo good! Got this tablet for my son after an accident with his previous... big screen great for watching movies or Netflix and has plenty space for his face games like roblox and bed wars.. battery life I think you would get about 4/5 hours of constant play out of it. We are happy with the purchase and would recommend.
Excellent price, tablet runs fast and battery lasts all day.  10/10 as described.

Got 2 of these to replace (very) old 8inch Acer tablets for kids. They are great. Unbeatable for the price. Decent amount of memory (32gb), good screen, performs pretty well and you get 2 free protective cases for it! Only downside is that the battery will not last for days but it is a budget tablet and still lasts for quite a while when in use. Highly recommend these tablets. Absolute bargain.
Great system well worth the money

For a budget tablet it performs quite well but it's picture quality is not the best. I have tried juggling with the settings but still cannot get a decent screen display. 
The sound is of poor quality but adequate for my needs.
The 32gb internal storage is brilliant plus a slot for a micro SD card to add external memory.
Fairly good. Only keeps one app in active memory so switching between apps can be bothersome as beach app reloads.

Bought to enhance my treadmill workouts, big screen, high quality resolution, jack plug for headphones, and only one issue, the audio quality playing through the speaker isn't as good at the higher volumes. It just not as clear as it could be, but it doesn't sound bad through headphones. Ots fine for the price

Fast and reliable! 

Worth the money
